mapper.insert: insert into work_divisions (ID, MENU_ID, TITLE, CONTENT1, CONTENT2, CONTENT3, CONTENT4, CONTENT5, REMARK, CREATE_ACCT, MODIFY_ACCT, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update work_divisions
MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT1 = #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT2 = #{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT3 = #{content3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT4 = #{content4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT5 = #{content5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

MODIFY_ACCT = #{modifyAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update work_divisions set MENU_ID = #{menuId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT1 = #{content1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT2 = #{content2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT3 = #{content3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT4 = #{content4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT5 = #{content5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_ACCT = #{createAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_ACCT = #{modifyAcct,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select w.*,case when w.CONTENT5 ='进行中' then 0 when w.CONTENT5 ='终止' then 1 when w.CONTENT5 ='完成' then 2 when w.CONTENT5 ='其它' then 3 end as statu from work_divisions w where w. menu_id=#{menuId} order by statu
limit 0,#{pageNum}
